question: Which observatory, established in 1928, is located in Tromsø, Norway?
asked_question_translated: ¿Qué observatorio, fundado en 1928, se encuentra en Tromsø (Noruega)?
answer: El observatorio fundado en 1928 en Tromsø, Noruega, es el Observatorio Geofísico de Tromsø.
answer_translated_eng: The observatory founded in 1928 in Tromsø, Norway, is the Tromsø Geophysical Observatory.
